channel.title: CVE Feed for smub -- User Feedback – Create Interactive Feedback Form, User Surveys, and Polls in Seconds
channel.description: The latest CVEs for smub -- User Feedback – Create Interactive Feedback Form, User Surveys, and Polls in Seconds

item.title: CVE-2024-0903|2024-02-22T05:32:48.735Z -- smub -- User Feedback – Create Interactive Feedback Form, User Surveys, and Polls in Seconds
item.description: The User Feedback – Create Interactive Feedback Form, User Surveys, and Polls in Seconds plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'page_submitted' 'link' value in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.13 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in the feedback submission page that will execute when a user clicks the link, while also pressing the command key.
